page.title: 15Traffic Pattern-Malpas Area
page.content: We carried out a{traffic census}at four different spots.The counts took place at{2p.m.}and lasted{ten minutes. All our class took part in the first count.This was on{Bettws Lane}opposite Newport High School. The traffic was mainly cars with one occupant. Four girls made a count on the {Malpas Road,}just north of the motorway roundabout.It was much busier than Bettws Lane but not as congested at 2 o'clock as it is at 9a.m.or 5p.m. Another count was made on{Caerleon {Road,}just south of the motorway roundabout.This road was also very busy. The{motorway}is an important part of Newport's transport system as drivers use it to get from one part of town to another.We found traffic flow heavy. Karen Williams and Tracy Port 4M
